attributes.action: urge companies to stop discriminating against people without internet access when charging for paper billing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TalkTalk and other companies are charging customers for paper billing thereby discriminating against those who have no access to the internet. Whilst I agree with e-billing where possible I believe it to be discrimanatory to charge a fee for those who cannot receive a bill via the internet.
